::: welcome-message
<mark style="background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0.7); color: white;"> This website showcases data visualizations on snails, water bodies, Fasciola hepatica cases <br>, environmental indices,temperature, and other data collected in the TMRC project.<br>The primary objective is to characterize the microenvironment of communities <br> in Cusco using high-resolution images, including processed images from multispectral <br>and thermal drones.These tools enable us to identify potential areas for water body <br>formation and snail proliferation, there by contributing to the understanding <br>and management of these phenomena in the local environment. </mark>
:::
